Detailed Description

Methods for initializing, finalizing, and querying the global MPI session.

Warning
This class has been DEPRECATED. Please include Teuchos_GlobalMPISession.hpp and use Teuchos::GlobalMPISession instead. Note the minor interface differences in the latter.
